variable.name: AGE
variable.description: Age of participant at first collection

variable.name: BMI
variable.description: Body mass index of participant at first collection
variable.comment: Calculated from participants' height (cm) and weight (kg) measured at Clinic Visit 1 by nursing staff using a stadiometer and calibrated scale respectively. Shoes were removed and light clothing was worn.

variable.name: SBP
variable.description: Systolic blood pressure of participant at first collection
variable.comment: Systolic (1st phase) blood pressure was obtained three times using a standard sphygmomanometer with the patient sitting for at least 5 minutes. The average was used.

variable.name: DBP
variable.description: Diastolic blood pressure of participant at first collection
variable.comment: Diastolic (5th phase) blood pressure was obtained three times using a standard sphygmomanometer with the patient sitting for at least 5 minutes. The average was used.

variable.name: TG
variable.comment: Serum lipid profile measured by Quest Diagnostics, Horsham, PA

variable.name: CHL
variable.comment: Serum lipid profile measured by Quest Diagnostics, Horsham, PA

variable.name: HDL
variable.comment: Serum lipid profile measured by Quest Diagnostics, Horsham, PA

variable.name: WST
variable.description: Waist circumference of participant at first collection

variable.name: GLUC
variable.comment: Serum glucose measured by Quest Diagnostics, Horsham, PA
